analysis.description:
CmctSale.bulkRelayCMCT has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(cmctToken.transfer(receivers[i],amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/3/0x5fe56cb82b3d88b6e37d3a9dba8f5b40b28dda7e.sol)

CMCT.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x5fe56cb82b3d88b6e37d3a9dba8f5b40b28dda7e.sol#280-281)
CMCT.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x5fe56cb82b3d88b6e37d3a9dba8f5b40b28dda7e.sol#277-280)
CMCT.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x5fe56cb82b3d88b6e37d3a9dba8f5b40b28dda7e.sol#280)
